Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Series: PRO
Model: PRO B550M-VC WIFI


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: AM4
CPU Type: Supports AMD Ryzen™
 5000 Series, 5000 G-Series, 4000 GSeries, and 3000 Series processors 
Supports AM4 socket 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen™ processors, and future AMD Ryzen™ processors with BIOS update


Chipsets
Chipset: AMD B550


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x DDR4 memory slots, support up to 128GB 1
Supports DDR4 1866/ 2133/ 2400/ 2667/ 2800/ 2933/ 3000/ 3066/ 3200 MHz by JEDEC
Supports DDR4 2667/ 2800 /2933 /3000 /3066 /3200 /3466 /3600/ 3733 /3866 /4000 /4133 /4266 /4400+ MHz by A-XMP OC MODE
1DPC 1R max speed 4400 MHZ
1DPC 2R max speed 3733 MHZ
2DPC 1R max speed 3866 MHZ
2DPC 2R max speed 3466 MHZ
Memory Standard: DDR4 3200
Maximum Memory Supported: 128GB
Channel Supported: Dual channel memory architecture
ECC Supported: Supports non-ECC UDIMM memory
Buffer Supported: Un-buffered


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 4.0 x16: 1x PCIe 3.0/ 4.0 x16 slot (PCI_E1)1
PCI Express 3.0 x16: 3x PCIe 3.0 x16 slots, support PCIe x1 speed


Storage Devices
Serial ATA (SATA): 4x SATA 6Gb/s ports
M.2: 2x M.2 slots (Key M)
M2_1 slot (from AMD Processor)
Supports PCIe 4.0/ 3.0 x4 1
Supports SATA 6Gb/s
Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280 storage devices
M2_2 slot (from AMD B550 chipset)
Supports PCIe 3.0x4
Supports 2242/ 2260/ 2280 storage devices
The supported specification depends on installed processor.
SATA RAID: Supports RAID 0, RAID 1 and RAID 10 for SATA storage devices
Supports RAID 0 and RAID 1 for M.2 NVMe storage devices


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek® ALC892/ALC897 Codec
Audio Channels: 7.1-Channel High Definition Audio


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: 1x Realtek® 8RTL8111GN / RTL8111HN 1Gbps LAN controller
Max LAN Speed: 1x Realtek® 8RTL8111GN / RTL8111HN 1Gbps LAN controller
Wireless LAN: AMD Wi-Fi 6E
The Wireless module is pre-installed in the M.2 (Key-E) slot
Supports MU-MIMO TX/RX, 2.4GHz/ 5GHz/ 6GHz 1 (160MHz) up to 2.4Gbps
Supports 802.11 a/ b/ g/ n/ ac/ ax
Bluetooth: Supports Bluetooth® 5.2 2, FIPS, FISMA
Wi-Fi 6E 6GHz may depend on every country’s regulations and will be ready in Windows 10 build 21H1 and Windows 11.Bluetooth 5.2 will be ready in Windows 10 build 21H1 and Windows 11.


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: VGA
USB3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps Type-A
Keyboard / Mouse
LAN port
WiFi/Bluetooth
Audio connector
Flash BIOS Button
DisplayPort
HDMI
USB 2.0
USB3.2 Gen1 5Gbps Type-A


Internal I/O Connectors
Other Connectors: 1x 24-pin ATX main power connector
1x 8-pin ATX 12V power connector
8x SATA 6Gb/s connectors
2x M.2 slots (M-Key)
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps Type-C port
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps connector (supports additional 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps ports)
2x USB 2.0 connectors (supports additional 4 USB 2.0 ports)
1x 4-pin CPU fan connector
1x 4-pin water-pump fan connector
3x 4-pin system fan connectors
1x Front panel audio connector
2x System panel connectors
1x Chassis Intrusion connector
1x 4-pin RGB LED connector
1x 3-pin RAINBOW LED connector
1xTPM module connector
1x Clear CMOS jumper


Physical Spec
Form Factor: MATX
Dimensions (W x L): 9.6 in. x 9.6 in. (24.4 cm x 24.4 cm)


Features
Features: Supports AMD Ryzen™ 5000 & 3000 Series desktop processors (not compatible with AMD Ryzen™ 5 3400G & Ryzen™ 3 3200G) and AMD Ryzen™ 4000 G-Series desktop processors
Supports DDR4 Memory, up to 4400(OC) MHz
Lightning Fast Experience: PCIe 4.0, Lightning Gen4 x4 M.2 with M.2 Shield Frozr
Premium Thermal Solution: 7W/mK pad, additional choke thermal pad and M.2 Shield Frozr are built for high performance system and non-stop works
Powerful Design: Core Boost, Digital PWM IC, 2oz Thickened Copper PCB, Creator Genie, DDR4 Boost
Audio Boost: Reward your ears with studio grade sound quality
Dragon Center: A brand new software which integrates all MSI exclusive tools with user friendly user interface.
Label: Board MSI Pro B550M-VC Wifi
